== Changelog ==
==0.2==
* Twitcher Api Integration
* Feedback capture
* Twitch Calendar sincronization
* Bug correction

= 0.1.1 =
* Import Streamings as Post
* Twitch Dashboard
* Schedule series
* Embeed streaming by shortcode
* Back up streaming link on youtube
* Asign Twitch video to post
* Easy Install
* Api Helix

= 0.1 =
* Public Beta Released
